title: Cloister of Saint Lorenzo, Florence
medium: Graphite on thick cream wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
description: Vertical sheet with sketches of architectural elements.  At left is a section of a buliding, with round arch ceiling below and slanted roof above.  At top left is a detail of an Ionic capital supporting a beam.  At right an elevation of a colonnade in the Ionic style supporting a tiled roof.  Below this is an elevation of an arcade in the Ionic style.  It is possible that these sketches are elevations of the first and second stories of the building shown in section at left.
name: Album page
